typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	partDistAttr as string,
	pintBatchId as integer
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: ['',('archive/' + toString($pintBatchId))]) ~> sourceLanding
sourceLanding derive(partdist = toDate($partDistAttr)) ~> derivedPartCols
derivedPartCols derive(intBatchId = $pintBatchId) ~> dcolBatchId
dcolBatchId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkCurationStagingPartition
